text:
If you are getting this error. Update your mage io_config.yaml file, and specify a timeout value set to 600 like this.
Make sure to save your changes.
MAGE - 2.2.4 Testing BigQuery connection using SQL 404 error:
NotFound: 404 Not found: Dataset ny-rides-diegogutierrez:None was not found in location northamerica-northeast1
If you get this error even with all roles/permissions given to the service account check if you have ticked the box where it says “Use raw SQL”, just like the image below.
question: MAGE -2.2.4 ConnectionError: ('Connection aborted.', TimeoutError('The write operation timed out'))
